full_title: Sensational by Chris Brown (Ft. Davido & Lojay)
title: Sensational

description.plain: “Sensational” is the second single from Chris' eleventh studio album, 11:11. Chris uploaded a snippet of him dancing to the song with his choreographer and dancers to Instagram on October 16th confirming its release date of October 20th. He confirmed the features via Instagram 3 hours later.

embed_content: Read “Sensational” by Chris Brown on Genius

body.plain: “Sensational” is the second single from Chris' eleventh studio album, 11:11. Chris uploaded a snippet of him dancing to the song with his choreographer and dancers to Instagram on October 16th confirming its release date of October 20th. He confirmed the features via Instagram 3 hours later.
